kw.name: Get Extended Region From Image
kw.doc: Get Extended Region From Image Extended the given image creating a new region above, below, on the left or on the right side, with the same height and width The height and width can change using the multiplier @number_of_times_to_repeat If orginal if giver as arguments, the region will be exactly the same location as the image, last argument is ignored Ex: If 2 is given and direction = below the new region will have twice the height of the given image and will be located right below it |${region} = | Get Extended Region From Image | image.png | below | 1 | |${region} = | Get Extended Region From Image | image.png | original | 1 #this argument is ignored |

kw.name: Get Extended Region From Image
kw.doc: Get Extended Region From Image Extended the given image creating a new region above, below, on the left or on the right side, with the same height and width The height and width can change using the multiplier @number_of_times_to_repeat If orginal if giver as arguments, the region will be exactly the same location as the image, last argument is ignored Ex: If 2 is given and direction = below the new region will have twice the height of the given image and will be located right below it |${region} = | Get Extended Region From Image | image.png | below | 1 | |${region} = | Get Extended Region From Image | image.png | original | 1 #this argument is ignored |

kw.name: Get Capture From VIP Device Using FTP
Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Ftp Connect
kw.doc: Constructs FTP object, opens a connection and login. TLS support is optional. Call this function before any other (otherwise raises exception). Returns server output. Parameters: - host - server host address - user(optional) - FTP user name. If not given, 'anonymous' is used. - password(optional) - FTP password. If not given, 'anonymous@' is used. - port(optional) - TCP port. By default 21. - timeout(optional) - timeout in seconds. By default 30. - connId(optional) - connection identifier. By default equals 'default' - tls(optional) - TLS connections flag. By default False - mode(optional) - set the transfer mode to 'active' or 'passive'. By default 'passive'
kw.msg: 220-Evertz FTP Server. Copyright 2001 Evertz Microsystems Ltd. All rights reserved. hello world. 220 Type QUOTE HELP for information.230 User logged in, proceed.

kw.name: Download File
kw.doc: Downloads file from current directory on FTP server in binary mode. If localFilePath is not given, file is saved in current local directory (by default folder containing robot framework project file) with the same name as source file. Returns server output Parameters: - remoteFileName - file name on FTP server - localFilePath (optional) - local file name or path where remote file should be saved. - connId(optional) - connection identifier. By default equals 'default' localFilePath variable can have following meanings: 1. file name (will be saved in current default directory); 2. full path (dir + file name) 3. dir path (original file name will be added) Examples: | download file | a.txt | | | | download file | a.txt | b.txt | connId=ftp1 | | download file | a.txt | D:/rfftppy/tmp | | | download file | a.txt | D:/rfftppy/tmp/b.txt | | | download file | a.txt | D:\rfftppy\tmp\c.txt | |

kw.name: Ftp Close
kw.doc: Closes FTP connection. Returns None. Parameters: - connId(optional) - connection identifier. By default equals 'default'

kw.name: Move File
kw.doc: Moves the source file into the destination.

kw.name: Verify Whether Output is same as Expected

test.doc: Test Audio Bar-Show Meter functionality Steps: Add Device Go to Multiviewer Display1 Go to widgets section. Drag and drop 4:3 widget Add source to it (Go to Sources section,Drag and drop Input-1) Go to widgets section. Drag and Drop audio bar widget on display Expand width and height of audio bar widget Enable all channels Connect audio bar to 4:3 widget Scroll down till show meter under window properties Enable show meter
test.status: TC02: Audio Bar-Show Meter Displaying on the Output --> TC02: Audio Bar-Show Meter Displaying on the Output Failed

kw.name: Close Application

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Screen Contain
kw.doc: Wait until screen contain Wait until image shown in screen

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Stop Remote Server
kw.doc: Stops the remote server.
